report

Class ViewReportsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.ViewReportsController

  • public class ViewReportsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for sending a user to the report that that he wishes, User can choose which branch and which month he wants to see along with if he wants to view a report of amount of orders by components or a report for the branches performance
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.String> defineListener()
      function to set listeners we call this on comboboxes to set an event listener that validates input whenever a change has been detected
      (package private) void goToRep(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      function to go to report chosen activates on view button press, we set branch name , year number , month number in class static variable so the reports can access it and we open the report matching all the combo boxes choices
      (package private) void goToReportScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      activates on pressing the back button sends us back to ReportsScreen.fxml
      private void initialize()
      initialzes our comboboxes with our lists and sets listeners for comboboxes to validate input so that we make sure all combo boxes have been selected
      private void validate_input()
      function to validate input we count if all combo boxes have been selected if they have been we enable the view buttn to go to the chosen report
